data.title: Flights to London Stansted Airport (STN)
data.meta_description: Fly to Stansted International Airport Stn LON. Information about airport facilities and more on BudgetAir.com now.
data.text:
Cheap Flights to London Stansted Airport (STN)

Looking for a great deal on cheap flights to London? BudgetAir compares all destinations, airlines and itineraries to offer you the cheapest flights to London. BudgetAir is a travel agency specialized in cheap international flights. We continuously look for ways to make it easier for you to find the cheap flight you are looking for. That's why we show the lowest possible flight found by our customers in the last 48 hours on all continents, countries, cities and airports. Look for our low priced flights from major United States' airports, like John F Kennedy Airport, San Francisco, LAX, and Chicago O'Hare. Whether you are visiting family across states, or abroad, BudgetAir finds the flight that's right for you. International travelers will find BudgetAir has a limitless selection of cheap one-way, return or multi-destination flights to North America, Europe, Asia, South America, the Middle East, Africa and the Caribbean. As a travel agent BudgetAir offers cheap flights on a range of regular and low cost carriers from the United States (United Airlines, American Airlines, Delta Air Lines) and abroad (AerLingus, British Airways, Air France, KLM, Etihad Airways, Emirates, Air Canada, Lufthansa, Turkish Airlines, China Airlines, and more).

Transportation from Stansted Intl. Arpt.

London, the capital of England is served by five major international airports: Heathrow Airport, Gatwick Airport, Stansted Airport, London City Airport and Luton Airport. Traveling between the city and the airport is made relatively easy by large number of public transport links that have been put in place over the years. The airport is 34 Miles NE of Central London, 23 Miles S of Cambridge. London Stansted Express train from the London Stansted airport, taxis , buses and limo services have been provided to help passengers to get into the city quickly and comfortably.

Transportation from Stansted Intl. Arpt. by Bus

Various types of buses such as Easy bus, National Express Sky train from the Stansted Airport and shuttle bus services are provided to help passengers to get into the city. A daily shuttle bus service runs approximately every 30 minutes from Standsted Airport to a number of hotels in the City.

Name: Local London Bus

Location: Station Is Located Between Zone C and D

Price: GBP 2

Ticket: Please Go To the Coach Ticket Desk Inside the Arrival Terminal

Time: 35-45 Minutes

Comments: Please Visit Website For Information On Routes, Stops, and Fares Please Pay Attention To the Bus Number. Different Numbers Go To Different Locations

Website: http://www.tfl.gov.uk/buses/

Name: Local London Bus

Location: Outside Of the Arrivals Terminal At Coach Bay # 26

Price: GBP 5

Ticket: Please Go To the Coach Ticket Desk Inside the Arrival Terminal

Time: 35-45 Minutes

Comments: Please Visit Website For Information On Routes, Stops, and Fares Please Pay Attention To the Bus Number. Different Numbers Go To Different Locations

Website: http://www.tfl.gov.uk/buses/

Transportation from Stansted Intl. Arpt. on Limo

Passengers willing to have a limo ride can opt for the limousines by doing a pre-booking before arriving at the airport. A number of local agencies offer this service and there is a car rental booth located within the airport terminal. Services are available even on hourly basis.

Name: E-Carey

Location: Pick Up Location Given Upon Making Reservations

Price: $392.41 Price Based On Airport To Downtown Service

Ticket: Please Make Payment Upon Reservations

Time: 60 Minutes

Comments: Please Make Reservations Two Days In Advance

Website: http://www.carey.com

Transportation from Stansted Intl. Arpt. on Taxi

Taxis are provided from the Standsted airport to help passengers to get into the City. Taxis take around 60 minutes from the Standsted airport to reach the city center. Various car rental agencies also provide car hires at very affordable rates to help passengers to get into the City on their own.

Name: Taxi

Location: Outside the Arrivals Terminal

Price: GBP 86

Ticket: Pay Driver

Time: 35-60 Minutes

Comments: Fastest Way Out Of the Airport But Not the CheapestRates May Very Depending OnTraffic, the Day,Time Of Day, and Time Of Year

Website: N/A

Transportation from Stansted Intl. Arpt. on Train

Rail services are provided from the Airport to get into the city. Stansted Express railway are provided to help passengers to get in to the City by trains. Information desks are available at the terminals to help passengers with their queries.

Name: Stansted Express

Location: Connected To the Arrivals TerminalFollow the Signs From Baggage Claim That Read "Stansted Express"

Price: GBP 15One Way, GBP 25 Round Trip

Ticket: Tickets Are Available At the Travelex Bureau de Change In the International Baggage Claim

Time: 35-45 Minutes

Comments: Please Visit Website For Information On Routes, Stops, and Fares Please Pay Attention To the Bus Number. Different Numbers Go To Different Locations

Website: http://www.stanstedexpress.com
